lead_paragraph: As long as the N.F.L. lockout continues, no signings, trades, practices or games will take place. But the ripple effects from this work stoppage are potentially more unsettling.
snippet: As long as the N.F.L. lockout continues, no signings, trades, practices or games will take place. But the ripple effects from this work stoppage are potentially more unsettling.
